dmca.title: Trademark and copyright claims
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Intellectual Property LVMH FASHION GROUP [mailto:ipd@fr.lvmh-fashion.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2007 11:01 AM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: Trademark and copyright claims
Importance: High







       (See attached file: C&D ISP citivogue.com.pdf)



       ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc
       Andrea Almeida
       1333 Stemmons Fwy., Ste 110
       Dallas, Texas 75207
       USA




       April 19, 2007

       By email (legal-response@theplanet.com)


       Re: Trademark and copyright claims


       Dear Andrea Almeida:

       I am legal counsel for LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER, the owner of certain
       copyrights  and  famous  brands protected by trademark registrations
       throughout the world, including the United States (see next page)

       We  hereby  notify  you  that  your  company  is currently providing
       hosting  services to the web site http://www.citivogue.com/ and that
       THIS  SITE  INFRINGES  UPON LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER'S TRADEMARKS AND
       COPYRIGHTS.

       In  compliance  with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), we
       ask  your  voluntary  assistance  in  removing  this  web  site,  or
       requiring  that  its  owner  ceases  any further infringement of the
       LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER intellectual property rights.

       We  would  appreciate  confirmation  of your action before April 29,
       2007.


       Sincerely,








                                               Nikolay Livadkin

Information  for  ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (IN COMPLIANCE WITH
THE DMCA):
   See above for signature.

    http://www.citivogue.com/    is   using   LOUIS   VUITTON   MALLETIER's
   copyrighted  material  without  authorization  and  selling  counterfeit
   merchandise,  which is prohibited by law. LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER is the
   owner of the following rights:
                                                                                  
                              |  Trademarks              |  Copyrights            
    --------------------------+--------------------------+----------------------- 
      Louis Vuitton           |  LV"  (registration  No. |  VA-1-225-388;         
                              |  1.519.828),      "Louis |  VA-1-225-389;         
                              |  Vuitton"  (registration |  VA-1-225-390;         
                              |  No. 1.990.760), "Floral |  VA-1-225-391,     VA  
                              |  Device"   (registration |  1-250-121-and     VA  
                              |  No. 3.107.072)          |  1-250-120             
                                                                                  



   By  clicking  the  links  below,  we  feel  your servers will be able to
   accurately  locate  the  infringing  material.  We have included several
   links  that  show  that  counterfeits are being sold in violation of the
   rights listed in
